narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: New Freedom Ops LLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $83.9M in Medicaid payments across 747K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $83.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
